**Meaning**: “=” does not exist between the parameter and the parameter value
“TYPE” parameter does not exist in the DOPE statement although BOX GAUSS or FREE is designated as a parameter value of PROFILE.
The 3D file includes a X or Y coordinate not to be defined at the top of the file.
The 3D file for DOPE or REGION statement cannot be read.
The array number in a parenthesis exceeds 255 in DEFINE statement.
BIAS statement has an error
DEFINE statement has an error

**Message**: DOPE MASK POLYGON OUT OF STRUCTURE!!
**Meaning**: A part of the designated polygon in the DOPE statement exists out of the calculated structure.

**Message**: ELECTRODE MASK POLYGON OUT OF STRUCTURE!!
**Meaning**: A part of the designated polygon in the ELECTRODE statement exists out of the calculated structure.
The designated electrode name does not exist in the RESTART file in OLD_ELECTRODE = Y case.
The element number of VALUE in a parenthesis exceeds 255 in DEFINE
The electrode name in EXTRACT statement does not exist in ant ELECTRODE statements.

**Message**: ENAME, NFNAME or PFNAME can not be found
**Meaning**: The name of ELECTRODE NFERMI or PFERMI in BIAS statement is not defined.
The maximum X-coordinate in GRID statement is larger than XMAX in STRUCTURE statement.
The maximum Y-coordinate in GRID statement is larger than YMAX in STRUCTURE statement.
The minimum Z-coordinate in GRID statement is smaller than ZMIN in STRUCTURE statement.
The maximum Z-coordinate in GRID statement is larger than ZMAX in STRUCTURE statement.

**Message**: EXTRACT MASK FILE READ ERROR: PLURAL POLYGON!!
**Meaning**: The designated MASK file in EXTRACT statement includes plural polygons.

**Message**: EXTRACT MASK POLYGON OUT OF STRUCTURE!!
**Meaning**: A part of the designated polygon in the EXTRACT statement exists out of the calculated structure.
The file format of 1D impurity profile in DOPE statement or the light intensity file in LIGHT statement is not appropriate.
A file parameter is not designated in EXTRACT statement.
An error occurred in reading the GDS data file.
The \*PLUS parameter is mismatched for \*MIN and \*MAX parameters in the GRID statement.

**Message**: Impurity file includes more than 1000 points !! *** FILE= Reduce the number of points or use SKIP parameter
**Meaning**: The number of depth and concentration pairs in the FREE file exceeds the limit of 1000 in the DOPE statement. It is needed to reduce the number of pairs or use SKIP parameter.

**Message**: INPUT ERROR *** SUPREM CAN USE ONLY "ELEM"
**Meaning**: The ELEMENT parameter is not designated in DOPE statement although 1D SUPREM file is designated.
The inappropriate parameter exists in the INSERT statement.
The designated file in INSERT statement cannot be opened.

**Message**: INTERFACE MASK POLYGON OUT OF STRUCTURE!!
**Meaning**: A part of the designated polygon in the INTERFACE statement exists out of the calculated structure.
The impurity file of ISE-2D cannot be opened.
An error occurred in reading the impurity file of ISE-2D.
The grid file of ISE-2D cannot be opened
An error occurred in reading the grid file of ISE-2D.
The designated parameter name is not appropriate.
The designated parameter value is not appropriate.
The designated statement is not appropriate.
The user parameter is not defined in any DEFINE statements.
The lateral diffusion length is assumed to be zero because the diffusion length along depth direction cannot be detected.

**Message**: Lateral diffusion length is larger than struct Xmax*\|Xrepeat\|/2
**Meaning**: The lateral diffusion length is larger than the product of Xmax of STRUCTURE statement and half of the absolute value of Xrepeat of DOPE statement.

**Message**: Lateral diffusion length is larger than struct Ymax*\|Yrepeat\|/2
**Meaning**: The lateral diffusion length is larger than the product of Ymax of STRUCTURE statement and half of the absolute value of Yrepeat of DOPE statement.

**Message**: LIGHT MASK POLYGON OUT OF STRUCTURE!!
**Meaning**: A part of the designated polygon in the LIGHT statement exists out of the calculated structure.
The designated MASK data is wrong format.
An error occurred in the AND/OR/TRIM operation of MASK data.
The electron current calculation was not converged.

**Message**: NFERMI MASK POLYGON OUT OF STRUCTURE!!
**Meaning**: A part of the designated polygon in the NFERMI statement exists out of the calculated structure.

**Message**: NFERMI SPECIFIED REGION OUT OF STRUCTURE!!
**Meaning**: A part of the box region defined by Xmin Xmax Ymin Ymax Zmin and Zmax in NFERMI statement exists out of the calculated structure.

**Message**: NFNAME and PFNAME should not be defined simultaneously
**Meaning**: Both of NFNAME and PFNAME are designated in a BIAS statement although it is prohibited.
The specified cell layer and data type does not exist in the MASK file.
A non-number value is specified as the parameter value which must be number.

**Message**: Number of BIAS cards must be less than 100
**Meaning**: The total number of BIAS statements exceeds the limit of 100.
The total number of arguments in POLYGON function is odd number.
The hole current calculation was not converged.

**Message**: PFERMI MASK POLYGON OUT OF STRUCTURE!!
**Meaning**: A part of the designated polygon in the PFERMI statement exists out of the calculated structure.

**Message**: PFERMI SPECIFIED REGION OUT OF STRUCTURE!!
**Meaning**: A part of the box region defined by Xmin Xmax Ymin Ymax Zmin and Zmax in PFERMI statement exists out of the calculated structure.
The vertices in the POLYGON function exceeds the limit of 1000.
An error occurred in dividing the polygon designated in the DOPE statement.
An error occurred in trimming the designated polygon.
An error occurred in dividing the designated polygon
The designated POLYGON function has a problem.
The designated polygon in DOPE statement is twisted.

**Message**: POLYGON CANNOT BE DIVIDED INTO RECTANGLES !!
**Meaning**: An error occurred in dividing the polygon designated in DOPE statement into rectangles.
The absolute value of potential exceeded the limit of 100 Volts in the potential calculation.
The total number of arguments in a PWL function is odd number or exceeds the limit of 200.
An error occurred in reading TOCCATA*.rtd file.

**Message**: REGION MASK POLYGON OUT OF STRUCTURE!!
**Meaning**: A part of the designated polygon in the REGION statement exists out of the calculated structure.
A part of the box region defined by Xmin Xmax Ymin Ymax Zmin and Zmax in REGION statement exists out of the calculated structure.
An error occurred in reading structure from the SILVACO SSUPREM4 file.
An error occurred in reading impurity profile from the SILVACO SSUPREM4 file.

**Message**: STRUCTURE ERROR: ZMIN MUST BE NEGATIVE
**Meaning**: The designated ZMIN value in STRUCTURE statement is positive although it must be negative.
An error occurred in reading the structure or impurity concentration from the SUPREM4 file.
The designated file does not exist.

**Message**: THE INPUT FILE DOES NOT EXIST :
**Meaning**: The input file does not exist.
The LOCOS structure mask name designated by LOCOS parameter in DOPE statement does not exist in any REGION statements.

**Message**: THIS FILE IS OLD VERSION TOCCATA ABSORPTION COEFFICIENT CANNOT BE USED
**Meaning**: Since the designated *.rtd file is old version the absorption coefficient cannot be read.

**Message**: THIS FILE IS OLD VERSION TOCCATA REFRACTIVE INDEX CANNOT BE USED
**Meaning**: Since the designated *.rtd file is old version the refractive index cannot be read.
An error occurred in reading the TSUPREM4 TIF format file.
The number of vertices in the designated polygon is less than three.

**Message**: TOO MANY EDGES IN SUPREM4 FILE: EDGE NUMBER MUST BE LESS THAN
**Meaning**: The total edge number in the designated SUPREM4 file exceeds the limit.
The total number of extracted parameters in the EXTRACT statement exceeds the limit of 30.

**Message**: TOO MANY FACES IN SUPREM4 FILE: FACE NUMBER MUST BE LESS THAN
**Meaning**: The total face number in the designated SUPREM4 file exceeds the limit.

**Message**: TOO MANY CELLS IN SUPREM4 FILE: CELL NUMBER MUST BE LESS THAN
**Meaning**: The total cell number in the designated SUPREM4 file exceeds the limit.

**Message**: TOO MANY NODES IN SUPREM4 FILE: NODE NUMBER MUST BE LESS THAN
**Meaning**: The total node number in the designated SUPREM4 file exceeds the limit.

**Message**: TOO MANY POINTS FOR LOCOS: THE NUMBER OF THE POINTS MUST BE LESS THAN
**Meaning**: The total array number in a parenthesis for LOCOS shape in REGION statement exceeds the limit.
The total number of vertices in the polygon of the designated MASK exceeds the limit of 1000.
The total number of polygons included in the designated MASK exceeds the limit of 255.
The total number of rectangles included in the designated MASK exceeds the limit of 255.
The nested loop stage number designated in DEFINE statement exceeds the limit of 10.
The total number of rectangles created from the MASK polygon in DOPE statement exceeds the limit of 1000.

**Message**: TOO MANY STATEMENTS NUMBER OF THE STATEMENT MUST BE LESS THAN
**Meaning**: The total number of the STATEMENTs exceeds the limit.

**Message**: TOO MANY STEPS IN THE POLYGON STEP NUMBER MUST BE LESS THAN
**Meaning**: The STEP number of an oblique side of the polygon designated in DOPE statement exceeds the limit.

**Message**: TOO MANY VERTICES IN THE MASK
**Meaning**: The vertices in the MASK exceeds the limit of 4000 in AND/OR/TRIM MASK operation.
The maximum concentration in the 1D impurity file in DOPE statement is less than 1E-6cm-3 in the case of PROFILE = FREE.

**Message**: TOTAL GRID NUMBER ( ) EXCEEDS LIMIT IT MUST BE LESS THAN
**Meaning**: The total grid number exceeds the limit value.
The voltage range of the ELECTRODE NFERMI and PFERMI parameters exceeds 34 volts.
